name: C64Hunt v1.1 (C64)
description:
C64Hunt v1.1 (C64) Commodore 64

Salvage, once again, yet another discovered lost S.S. Tramiel cargo liner lost-at-sea and filled to the brim with lost Commodore-related booty. The new updated v.1.1 has a new feature 'Nitrogen Narcosis' finally added along with some new treasures to behold. Also, a kool new Mo art screen is added to the game for your visual enjoyment. Kick your sunday shoes off and relax... and slowwww downnnn with your favorite home gaming computer system, the C64.

Great on mobile smartphone emulators or tablet with joy controls.
